'''1.18/gameplay-tweaks @ 8f847b11fb2''' is an unreleased [[developer version]] of [[Java Edition 1.18 experimental snapshot 6]], recorded in the morning of September 1, 2021,<ref>{{ytl|TycBrFKEteU|Minecraft 1.18 prepping a snapshot & explaining how stuff works|Henrik Kniberg|September 3, 2021}}</ref> and uploaded to [[Henrik Kniberg]]'s [[YouTube]] channel two days later on September 3.

== Changes ==
This version appears to contain all of the changes introduced in [[Java Edition 1.18 experimental snapshot 6|experimental snapshot 6]].

== Trivia ==
* The menu screen says that this version is modified.
* At 2:59 in the video, the debug screen reads "MOJANGSTAAAAAA" at the top alongside the version number.
